snippet.title: Star Citizen: PC Gaming 2018 Persistent Universe Trailer
snippet.description:
Your universe is waiting. Join us across seamless worlds chock full of potential exploits, breathless adventures, and harrowing encounters. Star Citizen continues to evolve, prepare for the Alpha 3.2 update coming soon.

------------------------------------------

Roberts Space Industries is a spacecraft manufacturer within the persistent-world game "Star Citizen" and its companion single-player spaceflight sim, "Squadron 42."  RSI is also your portal for information, updates, and purchases of your very own spacecraft with which to trade, plunder, and protect the citizens of Star Citizen.

Be sure to visit Roberts Space Industries here and on your favorite social platform:

RSI - http://RobertsSpaceIndustries.com 
Facebook - http://bit.ly/RSI_Facebook
Twitter - http://bit.ly/RSI_Twitter 
Twitch (Star Citizen) - http://bit.ly/RSI_Twitch
Instagram - http://bit.ly/RSI_Instagram
Google+ - http://bit.ly/RSI_GooglePlus
